mapper.select: SELECT mem_id, mem_tel, mem_mail, mem_zip, mem_addr1, mem_addr2, mem_division, mem_delete, company_id, company_num, company_file, company_dnm, company_nm, company_date, company_permission FROM member inner join company on(mem_id=company_id)

WITH ORDEREDBRD AS ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT mem_id, mem_tel, mem_mail, mem_zip, mem_addr1, mem_addr2, mem_division, DECODE(MEM_DELETE,'Y','탈퇴회원',' ') MEM_DELETE, company_id, company_num, company_file, company_dnm, company_nm, company_date, company_permission FROM member inner join company on(mem_id=company_id)
ORDER BY MEM_ID DESC )A ) SELECT count(*) FROM ORDEREDBRD
mapper.delete: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_DELETE = 'Y' WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY_ID , INDUSTRY_NM , COMINFO_PAGE , COMINFO_CONTENT , COMINFO_CEONM , COMINFO_EMP , COMINFO_SALES , COMINFO_BENEFIT , COMINFO_HIT FROM COMINFO A INNER JOIN INDUSTRY B ON A.COMINFO_SECTORS = B.INDUSTRY_NO WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
